text: Hey! Is there a way to store private keys somehow in HubSpot? Size limit for secrets is 186. We have an external api that requires signing requests with private key. (Enterprise account and using serverless functions)
Not conveniently or securely, that I know of. You could perhaps store it in a private file within the file manager, if youâ€™re desperate. Would add another API request or 2 to your script.
